name: TestArmy
description:
We’re veterans on the field of quality assurance in software development. During 7+ years on the market, we’ve delivered over 500 successful projects for more than 130 clients. With experience there comes the knowledge and we used ours to come out with an innovative approach that we call Business Driven Quality eXcellence.
We believe taking care of our clients quality should be based on customer needs and companies internal vision and politics. Therefore our task is to provide team and process augmentation for a secure and functional digital product.
Our services can be divided into 3 major groups, like peaks of a triangle:
Cybersecurity:
- Pentesting
- Cybersecurity programs
- Secure software manufacturing
- Cyber Resilience
Customer Experience:
- Accessibility
- Performance and scalability
- User Experience
Quality Excellence:
- Quality assurance consulting
- Automation
- Training and workshops

QA performed by TestArmy enables a thorough insight into the assurance level on every step of the customer journey and eventually improves Enterprise Digital Transformation in a modern manner. Our specialists adapt to your workflow to deliver quality support no matter how you run the project. Their job goes way beyond end-to-end testing and so does our entire mind- and skillset.
